description: Looking for someone to sublet my room while I am studying abroad next year. TV, cooking utensils, and cutlery is provided. Utilities not included.
Looking for a subletter while I am away this summer. The room comes with 4 great roommates and two bathrooms. Lots of video games and movies watched in the common room. Utilities not included.

Subletter needed ASAP! Last person bailed out on me last minute, looking for someone to sublet while I take the semester off. Really great unit. Awesome location and upstairs neighbors are super nice.
Subletter needed for this spring. Quick walk to the T Station in Davis. Really nice unit with friendly roommates. Email for more information.
Subletter requested! Looking for someone to hold down the fort while I am away. Cleanly unit with great roommates. Utilities not included.
Looking for a subletter ASAP. Summer 2023. Great location and great roommates. Utilities not included.
